page.title: 08LOCAL NEWS.
page.content: Our school had a litter problem until they stopped the tuck-shop selling food with wrappers,we also had new yellow bins installed.Another thing that helped our litter problem was the Break-appeal,everyone saves their Kit-Kat wrappers,then they are sent to the Break-appeal for the Deprived Children.Each wrapper is worth 3p.There is still one problem,the canteen is still selling sweets with wrappers,the main litter is 'crisp packets'.Hopefully they won't stop selling the crisps because if they did they'd lose a lot of profit.In every assembly the Head-of-Year tells us how the litter problem is improving,he said it's not one person dropping 1000's of pieces of litter, its 1000's of people dropping one piece of litter.We also have a sign saying 'keep this school tidy'.
